name: ivancraft
description:
ivancraft is a crafting extraction game. This game has been developed and optimized by us for a very long time.

There are endless possibilities for you in the world. With many surprises and various difficulties. Search and create new materials to build everything you want. Everything is possible here.

Animals:

there are several animals in ivancraft that you can either breed or leave alone. They can be fed and raised. Cows, sheep, pigs and many others.

What you can do:

everything you can imagine. Dig, build, collect, hunt, fish, breed, fight, explore, fly, and more.

Mods

There are two more mods to play. Hard and easy. Everything is open and accessible. In a difficult moment, you must make an effort. You have to get food, drink, sleep and everything you need to build something.
